item.title: 美国 5 月生产者价格反弹幅度低于预期
item.description: 受机票等服务成本下降的抑制，5 月份美国生产者价格的增幅低于预期。【原文：U.S. producer prices increased less than expected in May, restrained by lower costs for services like air fares.】

item.title: 尽管中国中化集团反对，倍耐力投资者仍支持 2024 年盈利报告
item.description: 倍耐力公司周四表示，尽管最大股东、中国国有控股集团中化集团（Sinochem）反对，但投资者还是批准了这家意大利轮胎制造商去年的财报。【原文：Pirelli investors on Thursday approved the Italian tyremaker's earnings report for last year despite the opposition of its largest shareholder, the Chinese state-controlled group Sinochem , the company said.】

item.title: 报道称龙星集团将向法国 BPCE 出售葡萄牙 Novo Banco 银行
item.description: 葡萄牙经济新闻媒体 ECO 周四称，美国私募股权基金 Lone Star 已决定将其持有的葡萄牙新银行（Novo Banco）75% 的股份出售给法国银行集团 BPCE，该交易对葡萄牙第四大银行的估值约为 70 亿欧元（81.4 亿美元）。【原文：U.S. private equity fund Lone Star has decided to sell its 75% stake in Novo Banco to French banking group BPCE in a deal that would value Portugal's fourth-largest lender at around 7 billion euros ($8.14 billion), Portuguese economic news outlet ECO said on Thursday.】

item.title: 摩根大通维持 2025 年油价在 60 美元中低水平的预测
item.description: 摩根大通周四淡化了对地缘政治的担忧，并维持其对油价的基本预测，即到2025年油价将保持在60美元上下，2026年将保持在60美元，但摩根大通表示，某些最坏的情况可能会使油价飙升至上述水平的两倍。【原文：JP Morgan downplayed geopolitical concerns on Thursday and maintained its base case forecast for oil prices to stay in the low-to-mid $60s through 2025 and $60 in 2026, but said certain worst-case scenarios could send prices surging to double those levels.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数稳定在较高水平
item.description: 由于劳动力市场状况继续稳步缓解，上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数保持在较高水平。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits was unchanged at higher levels last week as labor market conditions continued to steadily ease.】

item.title: 美光将在美国的投资扩大到约 2,000 亿美元
item.description: 美光科技公司（Micron Technology）周四表示，该公司计划将其在美国国内存储器制造领域的投资扩大到约 1500 亿美元，在研发领域的投资扩大到 500 亿美元。【原文：Micron Technology said on Thursday it was planning to expand its U.S. investments in domestic memory manufacturing to about $150 billion and in R&D to $50 billion.】

item.title: 印度航空灾难是波音 787 首次致命事故
item.description: 周四，印度航空公司一架飞往伦敦的波音787客机在从印度西部城市艾哈迈达巴德起飞几分钟后坠毁，机上共有242人，造成200多人遇难。【原文：More than 200 people were killed when an Air India Boeing 787 bound for London with 242 people on board crashed minutes after taking off from India's western city of Ahmedabad on Thursday.】

item.title: 监督组织称第二名意大利记者成为 Paragon 间谍软件的攻击目标
item.description: 互联网监督组织 "公民实验室"（Citizen Lab）称，最近又有一名意大利记者被美国监控公司 Paragon 的软件盯上，这引发了人们对监控丑闻的新质疑，该丑闻已导致意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）的政府与 Paragon 分道扬镳。【原文：A second Italian journalist was recently targeted by software made by U.S.-owned surveillance company Paragon, internet watchdog group Citizen Lab said, raising new questions about a surveillance scandal that has already led Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni's government and Paragon to part ways.】

item.title: 亚马逊要求法院取消欧盟技术标签，称其不会带来系统性风险
item.description: 亚马逊周四请求欧洲二审法院取消将其指定为须遵守具有里程碑意义的欧盟网络内容规则中更严格要求的平台，理由是亚马逊不会对其用户造成系统性风险。【原文：Amazon asked Europe's second-highest court on Thursday to scrap its designation as a platform subject to stricter requirements under landmark EU online content rules, arguing that it poses no systematic risks to its users.】

item.title: 独家报道法国干邑制造商向中国提供最低进口价格以抵御关税
item.description: 代表法国干邑生产商的谈判代表建议，对华出口的最低价格为每升 20 美元至 300 美元左右。【原文：Negotiators representing French cognac producers suggested minimum prices for exports to China of between $20 and around $300 per liter.】

item.title: 欧盟确认将银行业新规推迟至 2027 年
item.description: 欧盟委员会周四表示，将把新的全球银行交易规则的实施时间推迟一年，至 2027 年 1 月 1 日。【原文：The European Commission on Thursday said it would delay the implementation of new, global rules governing banks' trading by a year, until Jan 1, 2027.】

item.title: 早间竞价：石油上涨，美元下跌
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 8.64 亿美元美国首次公开募股后，Chime 将迎来期待已久的市场首秀
item.description: Chime 在首次公开募股中募集了 8.64 亿美元，将于周四晚些时候在纳斯达克上市，投资者将拭目以待这家数字银行能否保持近期新股上市首日的爆炸性涨幅。【原文：Chime is set to debut on the Nasdaq later on Thursday after raising $864 million in its initial public offering, with investors waiting to see whether the digital bank will maintain the recent streak of explosive first-day gains for new listings.】

item.title: 垂直宇航公司与布里斯托公司扩大合作，推出商业空中出租车服务
item.description: 英国电动飞机开发商垂直宇航公司（Vertical Aerospace）周四表示，该公司已扩大了与直升机运营商布里斯托集团（Bristow Group）的合作，旨在将空中出租车服务引入商业运营。【原文：British electric-aircraft developer Vertical Aerospace said on Thursday it has expanded its partnership with helicopter ride operator Bristow Group as it aims to bring air taxi services into commercial operation.】

item.title: 中东紧张局势加剧，华尔街期货下滑；波音公司下跌
item.description: 周四，美国股指期货下滑，原因是中东紧张局势加剧的迹象影响了风险情绪，而且投资者希望华盛顿最近与中国达成的贸易协议更加明朗。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped on Thursday as signs of rising tensions in the Middle East weighed on risk sentiment and investors sought more clarity on Washington's recent trade deals with China.】

item.title: Stellantis 高级经理称稀土供应 "六月无忧
item.description: Stellantis 欧洲业务主管周四表示，Stellantis 目前没有受到中国稀土供应瓶颈的影响，但这家汽车制造商过去在管理这种情况方面遇到过困难。【原文：Stellantis is currently unaffected by supply bottlenecks for rare earths from China, but the automaker had past difficulties in managing the situation, the head of its European operations said on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称 Synopsys 重启部分中国服务，核心工具销售仍受阻
item.description: 一位直接了解此事的消息人士告诉路透社，Synopsys 已恢复在中国提供部分服务，放宽了本月早些时候为遵守美国新的出口限制而实施的暂停。【原文：Synopsys has resumed offering some services in China, relaxing a suspension it implemented earlier this month to comply with new U.S. export curbs, a source with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 波音飞机在印度坠毁后股价下跌
item.description: 一架载有200多人的印度航空公司飞机在印度西部城市艾哈迈达巴德机场附近坠毁，飞机制造商波音公司的股票在周四美国股市盘前交易中下跌。【原文：Shares of planemaker Boeing slid in premarket U.S. trading on Thursday after an Air India aircraft with more than 200 people crashed near the airport in India's western city of Ahmedabad.】

item.title: 蚂蚁金服计划在香港申请稳定币发行商牌照
item.description: 中国电子商务巨头阿里巴巴的关联公司蚂蚁金服集团（Ant Group）周四发表声明称，计划通过其海外分支机构蚂蚁国际（Ant International）申请在香港发行稳定币的许可证。【原文：Ant Group , an affiliate of China's e-commerce giant Alibaba , plans to apply for a license to issue stablecoins in Hong Kong through its overseas arm Ant International, the subsidiary said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 西班牙 Multiverse 公司为压缩人工智能模型融资 2.17 亿美元
item.description: 西班牙人工智能公司Multiverse Computing周四表示，该公司已从投资公司Bullhound Capital、惠普公司、Forgepoint Capital和东芝公司融资1.89亿欧元（约合2.17亿美元），用于压缩人工智能语言模型。【原文：Spanish AI firm Multiverse Computing said on Thursday it has raised 189 million euros ($217 million) from investment firm Bullhound Capital, HP Inc , Forgepoint Capital and Toshiba, to compress AI language models.】

item.title: 贸易不确定性打压美元，多头加码亚洲货币：路透调查
item.description: 路透社周四的一项民意调查显示，由于中美贸易协议缺乏明确性，美元持续走低，大多数亚洲货币的看涨押注增强。【原文：Bullish bets firmed up on most Asian currencies as the lack of clarity on a U.S.-China trade agreement kept the dollar on the back foot, a Reuters poll showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 甲骨文股价飙升，人工智能云需求推动收入预测
item.description: 受人工智能相关云服务需求强劲的推动，甲骨文公司上调了年度营收预期，该公司股价在周四的盘前交易中大涨近8%。【原文：Oracle shares surged nearly 8% in premarket trading on Thursday after the company raised its annual revenue forecast, driven by strong demand for its AI-related cloud services.】

item.title: 尽管存在冲突和关税阴霾，巴黎航展仍将获得新喷气机订单
item.description: 尽管美国关税、冲突升级和脆弱的供应链对全球航空和国防工业造成了冲击，但航空航天制造商仍将在下周的巴黎航展上以大单飞机订单为目标，一切照旧。【原文：Aerospace manufacturers will aim to project business as usual with big-ticket aircraft orders at next week’s Paris Airshow, despite U.S. tariffs, escalating conflicts and fragile supply chains rattling the global aviation and defence industries.】

item.title: 华尔街顶级银行推出期权交易，把握印度卢比涨至 83 的潜在机会
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）的销售和交易部门建议对印度卢比进行期权交易，如果南亚货币在未来九个月内涨到 1 美元兑 83 卢比，那么期权交易就会有回报。【原文：Goldman Sachs' sales and trading desk is recommending an options play on the Indian rupee that will pay off if the South Asian currency rallies to 83 per U.S. dollar over the next nine months.】

item.title: 欧盟计划为数据中心采取节能措施
item.description: 欧盟能源专员周四表示，欧盟正在准备一揽子措施，以提高数据中心的节能水平。【原文：The European Union is preparing a package of measures to improve data centres' energy savings, the bloc's energy commissioner said on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普上任以来美国对华关税细目
item.description: 2018年以来，数十亿美元的中国商品受到美国额外关税的影响，最初是在唐纳德-特朗普首任总统时期，后来是在拜登政府时期。今年重返白宫的特朗普对中国征收了更多关税。【原文：Billions of dollars of Chinese goods have been impacted by additional U.S. tariffs since 2018, initially under the first Donald Trump presidency and later under the Biden administration. Returning to the White House this year, Trump has imposed even more duties on China.】

item.title: 中国确认与美国的贸易协议，称其始终信守承诺
item.description: 中国周四肯定了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布的贸易协议，称双方都需要遵守共识，并补充说中国始终信守诺言。【原文：China on Thursday affirmed a trade deal announced by U.S. President Donald Trump, saying both sides needed to abide by the consensus and adding China always kept its word.】

item.title: 经济学家预测，德国在经历两年萎缩后将恢复增长
item.description: 四家经济研究所周四表示，德国经济在连续两年萎缩后，今年有望实现增长，并上调了对2025年和2026年的预测。【原文：The German economy is expected to grow this year following two consecutive years of contraction, four economic institutes said on Thursday, raising their forecasts for 2025 and 2026.】

item.title: Binance 表示叙利亚居民现在可以使用它
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Binance 周四表示，已允许叙利亚居民全面使用 Binance 的产品和服务。【原文：Crypto currency exchange Binance on Thursday said it has granted full access to Binance products and services to Syrian residents.】

item.title: 前决策者称美国关税或已终结日本央行的加息周期
item.description: 日本央行（BOJ）前决策者正井孝子（Takako Masai）周四表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策可能已经终结了日本央行的加息周期，由于预计出口将受到打击，进一步加息的可能性正在迅速减弱。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs may have put an end to the Bank of Japan's rate-hike cycle, with the chance of further interest rate increases fading fast due to the expected hit to exports, former BOJ policymaker Takako Masai said on Thursday.】
